title: Implement output caching and persistence for notebook sessions
Implement proper error notification system inspired by Bacon
description:
module for displaying errors
- Parse structured errors from Rust
- Format for status bar (short) vs popup (detailed)
- Never throw exceptions with unsanitized content

### 3. Error Categories
- KernelError (startup, execution, timeout)
- ParseError (notebook, cell markers)
- GraphicsError (protocol, rendering)
- ConfigError (missing files, invalid values)
- FileError (not found, permissions)

### 4. Display Modes
- Status bar: One-line summary with emoji indicator
- Popup/tooltip: Full context with file:line and suggestion
- Log: Complete details for debugging

## Implementation Steps
1. Add bacon to devenv.nix for Rust development
2. Add thiserror to libnothelix dependencies  
3. Create error types in Rust
4. Create error-notification.scm module
5. Update kernel.scm and execution.scm to use new system
6. Add hover/tooltip support for inline errors
